duties_responsibilities.duty: Prepare samples and measure specifications using prescribed lab equipment for each product.
Analyze samples to determine sample condition and specifications, record data and measurements.
Conduct database searches, identify selections, make report comments, and generate reports based on correct specifications.
Communicate with manufacturers and distributors as required by specific products.
Assist in “Disaster Recovery” implementation and building wrap exercises for hurricane preparedness.
Assist other departments as needed or directed.
